name: install_dlc_workshoptools_cvar
description: Install the Counter-Strike Workshop Tools

name: con_enable
description: Enables the developer console in the game

name: cl_teamcounter_playercount_instead_of_avatars
description: During the active portion of the round, replace player avatars with team player count in the mini-scoreboard.

name: cl_weapon_selection_rarity_color
description: Weapons glow with their rarity color in the HUD

name: cl_teamid_overhead_colors_show
ingameName: Use Player Colors on Team ID
description: Use player colors on the name above teammates' heads

name: cl_mute_enemy_team
description: Mutes the enemy team (COMPROBAR EN QUE)

name: cl_mute_all_but_friends_and_party
description: Mutes all players except friends and party members

name: cl_allow_animated_avatars
description: Allow animated avatars in the HUD

name: cl_sanitize_player_names
description: Change name of players not in your friends list to something neutral

name: cl_scoreboard_survivors_always_on
description: Nobody knows what this does (maybe dangerzone stuff)

name: cl_obs_interp_enable
description: Smooth the camera transition between players in spectator mode

name: cl_sniper_delay_unscope
ingameName: Delay Sniper Rifle Un-Scope after Shot
description: Adds a delay after firing a shot before you can un-scope (only animation-wise and it's kinda awful)

name: cl_sniper_auto_rezoom
ingameName: Auto Re-Zoom Sniper Rifle After Shot
description: Automatically re-zoom the sniper rifle after firing a shot

name: cl_showloadout
description: Determines whether the Primary, Secondary and Knife are always shown in the HUD, if they are hidden, they will show for a short time if you switch weapon

name: cl_use_opens_buy_menu
ingameName: Open Buy Menu with Use Key
description: Open the buy menu with the use key

name: cl_quickinventory_lastinv
ingameName: Last Weapon on Radial Weapon Trap
description: This option is locked to true ingame, it currently doesn't work, and nobody uses the radial weapon menu

name: cl_radar_always_centered
description: Centers the radar on the player

name: cl_radar_rotate
description: Rotates the radar to match the player's view direction

name: cl_hud_radar_map_additive
ingameName: Radar HUD Map Blends With Background
description: Blends the radar layout with the background

name: cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard
description: Changes the shape of the radar to a square when the scoreboard is open

name: cl_radar_scale_dynamic
description: Changes the zoom level of the radar based on the map information

name: cl_grenadecrosshair_keepusercrosshair
description: Keep the regular crosshair when holding grenades

name: cl_grenadecrosshair_flash
description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for flashbangs

name: cl_grenadecrosshair_explosive
description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for HE grenades

name: cl_grenadecrosshair_fire
description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for Molotov cocktails and incendiary grenades

name: cl_grenadecrosshair_smoke
description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for smoke grenades

name: cl_grenadecrosshair_decoy
description: Show the grenade line-up crosshair for decoy grenades

name: cl_predict_body_shot_fx
description: Predict the body shot effects (blood and sound effects)

name: cl_predict_head_shot_fx
description: Predict the head shot effects (blood, sparks and sound effects)

name: cl_predict_kill_ragdolls
description: Transforms the player model into a ragdoll if a kill is predicted, could get reverted if the prediction was wrong

name: snd_steamaudio_enable_perspective_correction
description: *Yes:* Sound sources will be rendered accurately with respect to your field of view as you look at the PC screen. Sound emitters that are on the edge of your field of view will sound slightly in front of you. Sound emitters that are off-screen and directly to your side will sound fully panned to either L or R respectively. \n *No:* Sound emitters at the edge of your field of view will sound strongly panned to either L or R respectively. Ideal for those who play very close to the screen, or use wearable screen, or players that prefer legacy sound engines. Can be positionally misleading at certain angles to the listener.

name: snd_mute_losefocus
ingameName: Play Audio When Game In Background
description: Determines whether the game will play audio when you tabbed out

name: voice_loopback
description: Determines whether the game will play your own voice in the speakers

name: voice_always_sample_mic
description: Setups the mic when you open the game instead of the first time you press Push To Talk

name: snd_mute_mvp_music_live_players
ingameName: Mute MVP Music when players on both teams are alive
description: Determines whether to mute the MVP music when some players on both teams are alive

name: m_pitch
description: Sets the mouse pitch (vertical axis) to -0.022 in the game

name: m_yaw
description: Sets the mouse yaw (horizontal axis) to -0.022 in the game

name: cl_show_equipped_character_for_player_avatars false
ingameName: Show Equipped Character for Player Avatars
description: Determines whether to show the equipped character for player avatars in the HUD instead of Steam profile pricture

name: cl_invites_only_mainmenu
ingameName: Get invites only in Main Menu
description: If turned on, will ignore all invites when user is playing a match
